Class CombatConsumable

java.lang.Object
Items.Item
Items.CombatConsumable
public class CombatConsumable extends Item
Represents a consumable item that can be used in combat. These items provide various combat effects such as stuns, burns, or poisons that can be applied to enemies over multiple turns. This class extends the base Item class, adding combat-specific functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • CombatConsumable

      public CombatConsumable(String name, String effectType, int effectValue, int cost, boolean stuns, int duration)
      Constructs a new combat consumable item.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the consumable
      effectType - The type of effect (e.g., "Stuns", "Burns", "Poisons")
      effectValue - The potency or damage value of the effect
      cost - The gold cost of the item
      stuns - Whether the item has a stunning effect
      duration - The number of turns the effect lasts

  • Method Details

    • getEffectType

      public String getEffectType()
      Gets the type of effect this consumable applies.
      Returns:
      The effect type as a String (e.g., "Stuns", "Burns", "Poisons")

    • getEffectValue

      public int getEffectValue()
      Gets the value or potency of the effect. For damage effects, this represents the amount of damage dealt per turn.
      Returns:
      The effect value

    • getStuns

      public boolean getStuns()
      Checks if this consumable has a stunning effect.
      Returns:
      true if the consumable stuns the target, false otherwise

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      Gets the remaining duration of the effect in turns.
      Returns:
      The number of turns the effect will continue

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(int duration)
      Sets the remaining duration of the effect.
      Parameters:
      duration - The new duration value in turns

    • use

      public void use(NPC enemy)
      Applies the initial effect of the consumable to an enemy. This method handles the immediate effects when the item is first used.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The NPC target to apply the effect to

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(NPC enemy)
      Applies the ongoing effect of the consumable to an enemy. This method is called each turn to handle damage-over-time effects like burning or poison. It decrements the duration after applying the effect.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The NPC target to apply the ongoing effect to

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the effect of this consumable is still active.
      Returns:
      true if the effect is still active (duration > 0), false otherwise
